description:
When Lloyd showed up I was floored by just how big his cock is. It truly rivals Hagan or Vander's massive units.

Aries has come a long way, and with this video we nudge Lloyd a little bit to see if we can tempt him to come back and do even more!
title: Aries & Lloyd - Edge
